title: "Volpi Partners With TOPIC Embedded Systems to Offer Intelligence-embedded Optical Measurement Modules"
excerpt: "Volpi, a world leader in optoelectronics with operations in the U.S. and Switzerland, has partnered with Netherlands-based TOPIC Embedded Systems, a leader in embedded intelligence, to expand its portfolio of optoelectronic measurement solutions and further advance its digital initiatives."
